<Text: Hanoi:  From 1010 until 1802, it was the most important political centre of Vietnam.>

Text: Hanoi:  It was eclipsed by Huế, the imperial capital of Vietnam during the Nguyễn Dynasty (1802–1945), but Hanoi served as the capital of French Indochina from 1902 to 1954.
